name: Treachery in Beatdown City U.N. Trouble
name_original: Treachery in Beatdown City U.N. Trouble
description:
Treachery in Beatdown City U.N. Trouble is the exciting prologue to Treachery in Beatdown City!



Play as the US President Blake Orama on his way to give a speech at the UN, where he will eventually be kidnapped.

He may be stiff but Orama has the moves to put anyone in their place. In this dark comedy Brawling Action Tactics game explore and fight off a deluge of the WORST people!



FEATURES:
  • Use the power of the PRESIDENTIAL FIST to throw out fireballs, flying uppercuts, spinning kicks, and more!
  • Build your comboes from a bunch of fun unique attacks to create strike combos, grapple combos, and strike and grapple-ombos!
  • Use a mix of real time and COMBO MENU based attacks to tackle your foes!
  • Inflict Status Effects such as Stun, Burn and Bleed; but watch out, the enemies can do the same!
  • Fight against class based enemies, each with their own unique attack styles, behavior patterns and looks!
  • Nod your head to a timeless score by Inverse Phase, creator of such albums as Pretty Eight Machine and the Chipping of Isaac
